name: @cdo/code-studio
description: Pipeline for static assets used by our Code Studio rails app (i.e. dashboard)
author: Code.org

scripts.lint: npm run lint-js && npm run lint-css
scripts.coverage: mochify test/**/*.js --transform babelify --plugin [ mochify-istanbul --report json --report lcov --dir ./coverage ] && istanbul check-coverage ./coverage/coverage-final.json
scripts.build: npm run copy-assets && npm run build-css && npm run build-js
scripts.build:dist: npm run clean && npm run copy-assets && npm run build-css:dist && npm run build-js:dist
scripts.build-css:dist: npm run lint-css && npm run clean-css && scripts/build-css.js --dist
scripts.build-js:dist: npm run lint-js && npm test && npm run clean-js && scripts/build-js.js --dist && scripts/uglify-js.js
